Hub module¶

class Hub.Hub(engine, name)¶

Bases: labAPI.archetypes.device.Device, labAPI.archetypes.Optimizer.Optimizer, labAPI.archetypes.Link.Link, labAPI.archetypes.Parallel.ProcessHandler
